title: Context Test: Dependent Task
description: Extend the calculator module created by test-context-base task
instruction:
Building on the calculator module from the previous task:

1. Create an advanced_calculator.py that imports and extends the basic calculator
2. Add power and square root operations
3. Add a statistics module with mean and median functions
4. Create comprehensive tests for the new functions
5. Create a README.md documenting all available operations

NOTE: This task depends on test-context-base and will receive context about what files were created.
acceptance: advanced_calculator.py created extending the base calculator
